description: This painting depicts a group of workers making their way home after a day's work. They are all dressed in dark clothes, with some wearing hats and others sporting beards. The setting appears to be rural, with a small house visible in the background. The scene is painted in a realistic style, with muted colors that convey the tiredness and weariness of the workers. Overall, the painting captures the sense of resignation and fatigue that often accompanies manual labor.
